https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gikKtxQA4YmWkMP9XvBhZIyhAJ3.jpg Pauline is very disappointed by her boyfriend. Fearing lonely holidays, she accepts her boss Max's invitation to celebrate white Christmas in his parents' mountain hut. It is taken for granted that she is Max's girlfriend. He enjoys the misunderstanding and asks Pauline to play along. Das Schneeparadies
